Text: Ive got virgin broadband 50 meg and it normally takes me about 8 mins to download a 1.4 gig ufc ppv but this is taking ages its been downloading for not far off 10 hours and my seeding ratio is at 4.3 so to many people are downloading and not seeding (thats uploading after your torrent has finished downloading) so please if u dl this torrent at least seed what your downloading so for muppets out there that dont know how to seed, If your torrent is 1.5 gig then make sure your upload ratio is at least 1.5 but u will be surprised on how many people dont know how to seed but the more people that seed the longer and faster the torrent will be as this is a joke.
Audio and video are not synced up right, anyone know how to fix it without re-rendering?
